title: High ping in LoL.
body:
I have 200 ping at afternoon and 350+ at evening / night. It's unplayable. i can play 1 - 2 games in the morning with a normal ping (79 m/s) and then my ping goes up. I tried to change the DNS , Flushing dns etc...  The weird thing is that i can play any other game with a normal ping except for LoL. Help please!

-Thanks for paying attention

replies.body:
Are you playing relatively far from the server you're on (like in the US), are there any background downloads or other people on your network while you play, and are you on a wireless connection? These are the common reasons for consistently high ping, though the distance factor is unavoidable aside from moving or switching servers.

If you'd like to see where your high ping begins, you can run a tracert as per the [Network Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs). If the issue appears to start from your end then you may be able to improve your connection by following the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let us know if you need assistance, and how the troubleshooting goes.

No, i'm leaving near the server - i get usually 79 m/s. There are no background downlads while i'm playing and i'm not playing on wireless connection. i read the "Connection Troubleshooting Guide" , nothing helped me.

I recommend using our [Connection Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader), which takes network logs from your recent games and gives you an analysis of what's going on and potential steps to take for resolving the issue.

If you still have issues after working through that, please let me know.
